content: I have just got informed that the deadline has been extended to Jan 11th, and that very few applications have been received...Everyone interested might try their chance!

The new call for the same 2-yrs postdoctoral positions in Lyon/Saint-Ã‰tienne has just been posted:
https://milyon.universite-lyon.fr/postdoctoral-positions-2023-2025-130160.kjsp?RH=EN-MILYON-9659410765
"All applications not completed before January 4th 2023 will not be considered".
